thread.title: Michelle Obama to Reportedly Receive KING’S RANSOM for Book Deal, if She Reveals…
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama to Reportedly Receive KING’S RANSOM for Book Deal, if She Reveals…

author: Nickarama
title: Michelle Obama to Reportedly Receive KING’S RANSOM for Book Deal, if She Reveals…
text:
10:33pm January 4, 2017   
Michelle Obama and Barack Obama are expected to make a fortune selling their memoirs after they leave the White House. 
The couple are expected to make about $40 million between the two of them, with Michelle Obama pulling down the higher number at $20 million because she is a more ‘unknown quality,’ according to Opposing Views. 
A top editor said Michelle Obama ‘was more likable’ than Barack Obama and he definitely would pay more for her memoirs than for his. 
But there’s a catch to all this filthy lucre that people might be willing to fork over. 
But in order to bring in that large payday, Michelle would need to offer premium gossip, like “the ups and downs of her marriage” and “horror stories about raising her two daughters in the public spotlight,” one publishing executive said. 
And that’s not it. Michelle would also have to dish on her thoughts upon meeting with President-elect Donald Trump’s family and her real feelings about Hillary. 
In order for Barack Obama to pull down the big money, he too would have to give up interesting information such as information on Hillary Clinton and her email server or Benghazi. 
If either actually gave up the interesting dynamic with the Clintons, that would be a blockbuster, as many people believe the couples dislike each other and the association was one of political convenience. 
Anything on that or any of the scandals would certainly draw an audience. LIKE this article?
